titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I bade a cordial farewell to mine host & hostess: and came away by the 10 a.m. express. My journey was beguiled by the very interesting book – Principal Rainy's Life – which Dr Whyte presented to me. I read thro' most part of the first volume before we ran into the station at King's Cross.
